Sorry, Airly! Forgot about Crater.

::Crater::

Crater follows Dragonfly, but by the time he gets to the scene of the 
battle, Bullet had been stopped. He looks at Dragonfly.

"What do we do now?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Thyphon/Dragonfly::
> 
> Thyphon woke up of his evening's nap, he was furios cause someone 
had 
> turned on the alarms,  he trasformed in Beast mode, left his 
quarters.
> 
> 
> ***************
> 
> 
> "Have you heard Crater?" said Dragonfly while he ran towards 
> quarters's section "It seems that we have a fight here... 
> YIIIIHAHHHH... !!!!!!"
